basics.name: Su Ting Wen
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Master of Business Administration Graduate at the Information Management Department of National Central University, I am a self-taught software developer with passion in software development. I had accomplished several case of website and mobile app’s designing by using PHP and Java. I also have the ability to work effectively in the team, not only I have the experience with version control system like Git but also can speak multiple language.

work.summary: responsible for maintaining, processing and troubleshooting military computer systems/operations in the military base.
highlights: Helped office going paperless by offering online repair system using Bootstrap, jQuery and PHP.
Developed desktop mini dictionary and meeting notification service to increase productivity by Node.js and electron frame work.

work.summary: IT manager of Information Management department in NCU (National Central University).
highlights: Setting the Information security of Office ’s Servers (including Windows Server and Linux OS), patch up vulnerability in server and code.
Maintain database and front-end website contents also Implement new features for website service.
